name: Instruments
description:
This game is made for Global Game Jam 2021 @ ÜNOG: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/instruments-4

"Instruments" is a game about an unfortunate electric-guitar ("Redo") who is searching for his beloved -and kidnapped- girlfriend Ampy. Redo will try to face-down with each classical instrument that also hates Metal Music. Now you are in the role of our mighty Electric-Guitar, could you save your girlfriend and metal music?

Credits: 

Fatih Görgüç - 2D Art, Design

Semih Sevimli - Developer, Sound Design

Yusuf Işık - Sound Production

Yiğit Doruk - Developer, UX Design
